topic.title: Installing the Open AI API Key

body.p:
To connect to the Open AI platform, you will need an API Key. For this:
Log in on
Click on your organization avatar, then choose View API Keys
Pres + Create a new secret key
Copy the key to the clipboard
Paste the key into the API Key text field.

You can check if the add-on is connected to Open AI by switching to the Model tab. If the combo box contains a list of model names, the connection was successful. The default selected model is text-davinci-001.
